import React, { useContext } from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import { StoreContext } from "../context/StoreContext"; export default function Navbar() { const { cart, user } = useContext(StoreContext); return (

  • Beauty

    {user && (
  • Hello, {user.email}

); }
